text: My dwelling is often covered by frost and snow,\\n\\nThe foreign winds bring again spring and summer

Poem of Sorrow and Anger\\n\\n遄征日遐邁\\nHome runs far away day by day\\n悠悠三千里\\nThree thousand miles far from here\\n何時復交會\\nWhen will we meet again\\n念我出腹子\\nOh dear my daughter..\\n胸臆為摧敗\\nHeart breaks down..
This book is the basis of all calligraphy and created by Cai Yong, who made his name as a master calligrapher.
Write the word "Yong(永)" again and again. You may feel calm and your spirit step higher.
Lady Trieu comes and, with her, a thunder that shakes the very Earth.
The heavens themselves will punish the unjust.
